subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* In mainland China (based on {{w|Xin Zixing}} {{w2|zh|新字形}}) and Vietnamese [[Nôm]], the right component is written {{l|mul|争}}.
* In Hong Kong (based on {{w|Hong Kong Supplementary Character Set}}), the right component is written {{l|mul|爭}}.
* Due to {{w|Han unification}}, both forms are encoded under the same [[code point]]. This character will appear differently depending on the font used.
